title: All the Backlist! March 19, 2021
description:
This week, Patricia talks about a couple great backlist titles including an anthology full of Black girl magic!
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
The Fire Never Goes Out: A Memoir in Pictures by Noelle Stevenson
A Phoenix First Must Burn: Sixteen Stories of Black Girl Magic, Resistance, and Hope edited by Patrice Caldwell
Nimona by Noelle Stevenson
